categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: An attack on an Imperial fort took place in 3 ABY on the planet Coyerti when the Rebel Alliance's 61st Mobile Infantry assaulted a strategic Imperial fortification in the battle for the planet. Consisting of at least a dozen squads, the plan was devised by one of the squad leaders, Carver. Following a lengthy effort to take out an Imperial AT-ST, First Sergeant Hazram Namir and his squad watched the flashes of the battle erupt from afar and predicted the fort would be defeated soon enough. The battle subsequently ended in a victory for the Sixty-First.
The attack on an Imperial fort appeared in the 2015 novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
